As a university student, it's easy to get swamped by the multitude of commitments and schoolwork.
With **Blob**, stay on top of your tasks with ease! Using a simple messenger interface, you can be kept informed on your existing tasks!
> `list` - Lists all of your existing tasks\
> `todo taskName` - adds a `todo` task called `taskName` to your list\
> `deadline taskName /by A` - adds a `deadline` task to your list\
> `event taskName /from A /to B` - adds an `event` task to your list\
> `find XX` - lists all tasks with names that contain `XX`\
The data is saved in a `.csv` file to allow for further data analysis (if needed)!
* Represents chatbot Blob. Blob is able to help the user form a "to-do" list
* in the form of a csv file.
* Blob requires the user to enter the file path to which they desire the csv file to be saved

* @param ui Ui used by the chatbot.
* @param tasklist Tasklist containing all exisitng tasks.
* @param action String representation of the input from the user.
*               'bye' - exits the conversation with the bot
*               'mark X' - marks X'th task as done
*               'unmark X' - marks X'th task as not done
*               'delete X' - removes X'th task from the database
*               'todo task' - adds a to-do task to database
*               'deadline task /by YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm' - adds a deadline task to the database
*               'event task /from YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm /to YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm' - adds a event task to the database
